about_the_game:
Go back to Phoenix and enjoy the super sexy soundtrack that features in the game! Remind yourself of old good times and watch how listening to these tracks will make YOUR PHOENIX RISE!

All tracks composed and produced by celebrated Swedish producer DJ Twili(kn)ight.

Track List

01 - Phoenix Sexy Time Funk
02 - Lucy's Theme
03 - Jessie's Theme
04 - Sonia's Theme
05 - The Phoenix Regency Resort
06 - Romance in the Air
07 - The Restaurant
08 - The Hotel Bedroom

Album Title - King of Phoenix Music

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
